mapper.sql: PKID, ELOAN_CODE, RELEASE_AMOUNT, RELEASE_TIME, CONFIRM_TIME, CONFIRM_STATUS, CONFIRM_USER, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY
mapper.insert: insert into sctrans.T_TO_ELOAN_REL (PKID, ELOAN_CODE, RELEASE_AMOUNT, RELEASE_TIME, CONFIRM_TIME, CONFIRM_STATUS, CONFIRM_USER, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eloanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{releaseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{confirmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{confirmStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{confirmUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GETDATE(), @{SESSION_USER_ID}, GETDATE(), @{SESSION_USER_ID})

RELEASE_AMOUNT = #{releaseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RELEASE_TIME = #{releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CONFIRM_TIME = #{confirmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CONFIRM_STATUS = #{confirmStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},

update sctrans.T_TO_ELOAN_REL set ELOAN_CODE = #{eloanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RELEASE_AMOUNT = #{releaseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RELEASE_TIME = #{releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CONFIRM_TIME = #{confirmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CONFIRM_STATUS = #{confirmStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, CONFIRM_USER = #{confirmUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(RELEASE_AMOUNT) FROM sctrans.T_TO_ELOAN_REL WHERE CONFIRM_STATUS = 1 AND ELOAN_CODE = #{eloanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update.foreach:
update sctrans.T_TO_ELOAN_REL
RELEASE_AMOUNT = #{item.releaseAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RELEASE_TIME = #{item.releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CONFIRM_TIME = #{item.confirmTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CONFIRM_STATUS = #{item.confirmStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
CONFIRM_USER = #{item.confirmUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = GETDATE(), CREATE_BY = @{SESSION_USER_ID}, UPDATE_TIME = GETDATE(), UPDATE_BY = @{SESSION_USER_ID},
where PKID = #{item.pkid}
